name: Photo
description:
Photo is a 3D adventure platformer prototype. Equipped with your magic camera you must traverse each level to reach the endzone. This game is a prototype for a college submission for the third year prototyping module at Technological University Dublin City Campus Game Design course. 

Requires Xbox One Controller

Asset References:

  • Royalty // Free Download Ambient Music, by Mattia Cupelli on YouTube 
  • Bobbin,by David Renda on https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
